header.#text:
No salaries for

unless

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any
			 other provision of law, an individual shall not receive any salary or payment
			 for services performed as a member of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, in accordance with clause 2 of section 2 of article II of the United
			 States Constitution; or

text.#text: by and with the advice and consent of the

appointed appropriately in accordance with
			 clause 3 of section 2 of article II of the United States Constitution.

This section shall take effect on the first day of the first
			 applicable pay period beginning on or after the date of enactment of this
			 Act.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not convene or take any agency action, as defined in

, and including any determination,

			 purported appointment of individuals to such
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 551 of title 5, United States Code

text.#text:
Notwithstanding any
			 other provision of law, an unconstitutional quorum of the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
that includes one or more individuals who
			 were purportedly appointed to the

and who are the subject of a cause of
			 action relating to such purported appointment that is pending before a Federal
			 court on the date of enactment of this Act.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To prevent certain individuals purportedly appointed to
		  the National Labor Relations Board from receiving salaries, and to prevent an
		  unconstitutional quorum of the Board from taking agency actions, until there is
		  a final decision in pending lawsuits regarding the constitutionality of certain
		  alleged recess appointments.

committee-name.#text:
Committee on Health, Education, Labor,
			 and Pensions
